pullrequest.title: Warn if there are ROS package dependency problems.

content.raw: at some point when there is more breathing room, we should consolidate all of this into a "check_rospack_deps" or something and make a cmake macro file in osrf_common, so we don't have these blocks copy/pasted across many CMakeLists.txt files. but this is fine for now.
content.html: at some point when there is more breathing room, we should consolidate all of this into a "check_rospack_deps" or something and make a cmake macro file in osrf_common, so we don't have these blocks copy/pasted across many CMakeLists.txt files. but this is fine for now.
